https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/i0NOqrnE4FhXrk9cHm6DQeRo1Zm.jpg A chronicle biopic of the 22-year career of soccer star Roberto Baggio, including depictions of his difficult debut as a player, his deep rifts with some of his coaches, his triumph over injuries and personal discovery of Buddism. Baggio: The Divine Ponytail
